snippet: Underscoring a power shift away from Europe, Uruguay fought — and apparently even bit — its way to a 1-0 victory over Italy Tuesday to move to the World Cup's next round with Costa Rica, which sent England home without a single victory...

headline.print_headline: Uruguay Beats Italy to Advance; Greece Late Winner
headline.main: Uruguay Beats Italy to Advance; Greece Late Winner

lead_paragraph: Underscoring a power shift away from Europe, Uruguay fought — and apparently even bit — its way to a 1-0 victory over Italy Tuesday to move to the World Cup's next round with Costa Rica, which sent England home without a single victory after a goalless draw.
